alert.note: Alert for Guam (Guam) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Flood Advisory issued May 30 at 1:29PM ChST until May 30 at 2:00PM ChST by NWS Guam
info.description: ...FLOOD ADVISORY IN EFFECT UNTIL 6 PM CHST THIS EVENING... ...REPLACES FLASH FLOOD WARNING... * WHAT...Flooding caused by excessive rainfall is occurring. * WHERE...Central and Southern Guam. * WHEN...Until 600 PM ChST. * IMPACTS...Minor flooding in low-lying and poor drainage areas. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS... - At 123 PM ChST, public and trained weather spotters reported flooding in the advisory area. Overflowing poor drainage areas will cause minor flooding in the advisory area. Between 2 and 4 inches of rain have fallen since last night. - Saturated soils from Mawar and heavy rainfall since last night is leading to excessive water runoff and flooding. Debris left behind from Mawar and clogged drains are contributing to the flooding. - Some locations that will experience flooding include... mainly rural areas of Asan, Tamuning, Chalan Pago-Ordot, Talofofo, Yona, Santa Rita, Inarajan, Merizo, Ipan Buoy, Apra Harbor, Hagatna, Piti, Mongmong-Toto-Maite, Agat, CoCo Island, Hagatna Heights, Dededo, Umatac, Barrigada, Sinajana and Mangilao - http://www.weather.gov/safety/flood
info.instruction: Turn around, don`t drown when encountering flooded roads. Most flood deaths occur in vehicles.
